anwers: To offer to buy him lunch
He is out of the office.
He is meeting with a client.
He is talking on the phone.

questions.questionTitle: What does Nick offer to do?

script:
� Hey Nick, this is Patricia. Can you do something for me, please?
� Sure Patricia. What do you need?
� I can't get a hold of Kevin. His line's been busy for the last 10 minutes, and I've got to go. Could you please call him and tell him I won't be able to have lunch with him today. I have to meet with a client who just came into town.
� OK, no problem. Do you want me to reschedule for tomorrow?
